deployment.author: N/A
deployment.message:
{"type":"deployment","sha":"27437c3f86852a4e7af7013bad91576ff9c09168","repoName":"vikramkatyani/elg-net-9","actor":"vaibhavkatyani","slotName":"production","commitMessage":"Fix: Resolve Entity Framework 6 connection string resolution in .NET Core

- Modified AdminDBEntity.Context.cs to inject IConfiguration for connection string lookup
- Modified learnerDbEntity.Context.cs with configuration-based connection string support
- Modified sadbEntity.Context.cs (superadmindbEntities) with configuration injection
- Updated Program.cs to set static _configuration property on DbContext classes
- Fixed App.Config with correct EDMX embedded resource names (DBEntity.AdminDBEntity, DbEntityLearner.learnerDbEntity, DBEntitySA.sadbEntity)
- Corrected appsettings.Production.json connection string metadata paths to match actual embedded resource names

ROOT CAUSE: Entity Framework 6 auto-generated constructors used hardcoded 'name=contextName' references that don't work in .NET Core. Additionally, EDMX metadata paths were incorrect, preventing resource resolution.

SOLUTION: Implemented static configuration injection pattern allowing DbContexts to read connection strings "}
